Package model.player

This package contains the representation for the Player object, and its respective interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayerInterface
    This interface defines the methods a Player should have.
    SimplePlayerInterface
    Describes the SimplePlayer class, which is created as an equivalent representation of an Player object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Player
    This class defines a Player playing in the poker game.
    SimplePlayer
    A SimplePlayer object is created to represent an instance of an already created Player object more simply.
    SimplePlayer.Move
    Describes a move, in this context a move is a player reacting to the current game state by either folding, checking, calling, betting, raising, or going all-in.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Player.Option
    The options that each player has during their turn.

Package model.player Description

This package contains the representation for the Player object, and its respective interface.

The Player object contains the abstract representation of the user playing the game.This package contains part of the Model of MVC representation used throughout. The player object helps to store pertinent information about the user during game play.

Since:
10/3/2016
Version:
1.0
Author:
Emmet Murray
